<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/files/rooms/{id}/news"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of all the new items from a room with the ID specified in the request.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}

>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
